# Running the tests

The package allows you to run benchmark tests on several different installations of R on the same machine

```{r init, echo=FALSE}
library("version.compare")
library("knitr")
r <- findRscript(version = "3.2.1.*x64")
test.results <- RevoMultiBenchmark(rVersions = r, threads = c(1, 4), scale.factor = 0.25)
```


# Compare results

## Elapsed time

```{r compare-results, echo=FALSE}
kable(test.results)
```

## Performance speed-up

```{r performance-speed-up, echo=FALSE}
kable(urbanekPerformance(test.results))
```
